CA: Low-Emissions Vehicle Program enacted (LEV I plus ZEV)

US: Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act (ISTEA) of 1991
Partnership for a New Generation of Vehicles established
Energy Policy and Conservation Act Amendments of 1994
The National Highway System Designation Act of 1995
Leaded gasoline banned as part of Clean Air Act
Transportation Equity Act of the 21st Century (TEA 21) of 1998
CA: Low-Emission Vehicle Program revised (LEV II)
Public Transit Bus Fleet Rule and Emission Standards for New Urban Buses
Amendments to LEV II and Zero-Emission Vehicle Regulations
AB 1493: Clean Cars Standards ('Pavley')
California Energy Action Plan (EAP) adopted

US: Safe Accountable Flexible Transportation Equity Act - A Legacy For Users (SAFTEA- LU) of 2005
CA: Executive Order S-3-05 (Governor's Climate Change E.O.-Gov. Schwarzenegger)
AB 32: Global Warming Solutions Act
SB 375: Sustainable Communities & Climate Change Protection Act

US: CAFE (Corporate Average Fuel Economy) Standards of 2009
CA: Executive Order S-1-07 signed by Governor Schwarzenegger

US: Light-Duty Vehicle Greenhouse Gas Emission Standards and Corporate Average Fuel Economy Standards established

CA: Low Carbon Fuel Standard (LCFS) regulation implemented under AB 32
Advanced Clean Cars Program adopted by CARB for 2017 - 2025 vehicles
Executive Order B-16-2012 signed by Governor Jerry Brown

US: National Program to Improve Fuel. Economy and Greenhouse Gases for Passenger Cars and Light Trucks extended through 2025
Tier 3 Motor Vehicle Emission and Fuel Standards established

CA: Executive Order B-30-15 signed by Governor Jerry Brown
SB 32: Updates to the California Global Warning Solutions Act of 2006
AB1/SB1: Road Recovery and Accountability Act in California
Executive Order B-48-18 signed by Governor Jerry Brown
SB 1014: California Clean Miles Standard and Incentive Program
SB 100: The 100 Percent Clean Energy Act of 2018

US: Safer Affordable Fuel- Efficient (SAFE) Vehicle Rule Part One
CA: Executive Order N-79-20 signed by Governor Gavin Newsom
